Plot: Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.
Title: Tremors
Writer: S.S. Wilson (story), Brent Maddock (story), Ron Underwood (story), S.S. Wilson (screenplay), Brent Maddock (screenplay)
Actors: Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross
tomatoConsensus: An affectionate throwback to 1950s creature features, Tremors reinvigorates its genre tropes with a finely balanced combination of horror and humor.
